ai.summary: A very short, easy hike on the Gainsborough Trail near Great Cornard, UK. At only 0.3 km, it is suitable for all ages and is ideal for a quick leg-stretch or family stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gentle terrain on a well-trodden path. Surfaces may include gravel, compacted earth or grass, with occasional small uneven spots.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on the marked path, supervise children, and watch for uneven ground or roots. Check the weather before you go, wear appropriate footwear, carry water and a charged phone, and be mindful of seasonal daylight. In urban or park settings, observe local guidelines and keep a safe distance from others.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn are ideal; the walk is suitable year-round with proper clothing and footwear.
